ComicInfo.Summary:
Billy Tucci's Shi concludes her first color series as Avatar with this action packed finale!
Shi is trapped in between a vicious warlord that wants her dead and the innocent village which took her in to heal after the severe wounds of her last battle. With no choice but to engage the huge samurai army, she assembles what little help she can find and prepares for what will certainly be her most deadly battle!
Set in the Feudal times of Japan, Poisoned Paradise is the first of Billy Tucci's all-new stories of Shi through the ages. The time period is brought back to life with the luscious artwork of Karl Waller and vibrant colors by Nimbus. Don't miss this stunning conclusion!
